statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM store WHERE store_name = 'Mall Store';
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'return' AND quantity_changed < 0;
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type='SELL' AND quantity_changed > 10;
DELETE FROM RetailStoresInventory WHERE store_id IN (SELECT store_id FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM sales WHERE item_id = 10 AND store_id = 3;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE store_id = 2 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE store_id = 3 AND device_id = 5;
